reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting China's educational reform and facilitate UK-China education cooperation

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK experience to deepen China's education reform and facilitate UK-China education cooperation. It will do this through setting up an education system pilot project in the fields of tourism and hospitality management, and cultural creativity, by June 2017. In doing so, it is expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
